TopicTitle: Kerbal enhanced plus dlc losing save files xbox

Articles.Content: I recently came back to kerbal on my Xbox series s and bought the expansion to go with it. Playing a new career, I get some way through the game (roughly attaining orbit of mun) when the game crashes out of career mode at the end of a mission and into sandbox. At this stage, it decides all my save files (as I saved incremental versions in case) are corrupt and deletes them, so I’m left having to start my career from nothing again (for the third time now )

Same thing happened to me, twice now. This is completely unexcusable and very frustrating. I'm sure ksp technical support could care less and offers no help to anyone that this happens to, Which Is Allot. This is a know problem and makes the game worthless in my eyes at well as a waste of money. I've never seen a games tech. support not be able to retrieve someone's career. Simply NOT OK, KSP.
